data.text: You people [MTY] of Israel, listen to this funeral song that I will sing about you:
“You are like [MET] a young woman,
This is what Yahweh the Lord says to the people [MTY] of Israel:
Yahweh continues to say to the people [MTY] of Israel:
Do not go to Bethel to seek my help;
So, come to Yahweh;
You people distort what is fair/right and cause people to think that it is something that is very bitter;
Do you know who created all the groups of stars
He causes strong soldiers to be killed,
He is the one who will punish you
You oppress poor people and force them to pay big taxes.
I know all of your sins
This is a time when many people do evil things,
In order to remain alive,
Love what is good, and hate what is evil!
“Because I, Yahweh, will punish you for your sins, this is what I have solemnly declared:
People will be wailing in your vineyards,
Terrible things will happen to you who desire that it will soon be the day when Yahweh will punish your enemies,
At that time, when you try to run from a lion,
That day, when he punishes people, will certainly be [RHQ] a very dark day [MET],
Yahweh says, “I hate your religious celebrations
Even if you bring me offerings that will be completely burned on the altar and offerings of grain,
So, stop singing noisy/loud songs!
Instead, your continually acting justly/fairly and righteously should be never stop,
You Israeli people [MTY], your ancestors wandered through the desert for 40 years;
But they carried the two idols that they had made—
Therefore, now I will force you to go to a country that is far beyond Damascus!
